Your password must be at least 8 characters long. Your password cannot exceed 128 characters. Please ensure your password contains at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one digit. Password can include: Latin letters, Arabic numerals, and these special characters: ~!@#$%^&*_-+()[]{}></|'.,:; Spaces are not allowed in your password. Passwords don't match Passwords don't match. Event Details Thoughts Analysis Emotional Type Physical Sensations Describe the event or situation.
What happened? Reflect on your thoughts related to the situation. What were you thinking? How are you feeling? Describe your emotions
or choose from our prompt. Describe any physical sensations or changes you noticed in your body. For example, tension, butterflies, etc.
How are you feeling? Choose from our prompt. How are you feeling? TERRIBLE BAD OKAY GOOD GREAT
Terrible Bad Okay Good Great Loss Humility Anxiety Embarrassment Depression Fear Anger Excitement Shame Disgust Guilt Nervousness Sadness Exhaustion Impatience Disappointment Confusion Loneliness Acceptance Frustration Laziness Pride Hope Calmness Gratitude Interest Respect Enthusiasm Happiness Inspiration Joy Love Amazement Satisfaction Self-love Euphoria
Socratic Dialogue Dear Benjamin,

This exercise uses a technique called Socratic Dialogue, which will help you to determine how accurate and helpful certain thoughts may be.

Specifically, this is done by exploring how you came to have those thoughts, and evaluating the evidence regarding those and other possible thoughts. What motivates you to pursue your current career path? Please share insights into the motivations and factors that inspire your choice of the current professional journey. Write your answer here... Which of the following skills do you believe is most crucial for success in your current role? Leadership Communication Problem-solving Technical expertise Which of the following professional development activities have you actively engaged in? Select all that apply. More than one answer possible. Attending workshops or conferences Pursuing further education or certifications Participating in mentorship programs Joining industry-related associations On a scale of 1 to 10, how satisfied are you with your current work-life balance? Navigating Professional Development Skills Survey Which skill is key to success in your role? Leadership, Communication, Problem-solving, or Technical expertise? Your viewpoint shapes our collective understanding of essential skills. Professional Development Snapshot Active in workshops, further education, mentorship, or industry associations? Select your engagements to showcase your commitmen to continuous learning. Dunning-Kruger Effect Share this task with my therapist Complete Task It seems not all fields are filled Closing task without completion may lead to data loss
